nodes.text: Would you like to have an apple, O Apple of my Eye?
Apple of your eye? Vot does that mean? It sounds nasty.
Um, well, it just means that I find you attractive.
It is better to say vot you mean rather than saying silly things you do not mean. And no, I do not vish an apple.
This bead necklace would look lovely on you. Would you like to have it?
Ooh, pretty! I vould like it very much. Thank you, Shawn.
This is probably the best wine ever made. I can think of no one I'd rather share it with than you. Would you like it?
Is good to share. Sharing makes good things better! Sharing makes good times better.
Katie - Shawn is sharing this very good vine! Come, share, drink!
Thank you. Here's to smooth sailing ahead for all of us!
Noroc!
That vas very good, Shawn. I am most happy.
I have a bottle of fine wine. Would you like to share it with me?
No, thank you. Vith all the time that I am in the Vine Cellar, I am tired of the smell of vine.
I came across a bottle of Golden Wine. It's a rare treasure... much like you are. Will you share it with me?
Of course, I vill be very happy to share this vine vith you. You are friend.
Katie - Shawn vishes to share vith us this drink.
Thanks, Shawn! I'll be happy to raise a toast. "To fine friends and fine wine!"
Noroc!
That vas fun. This vine, it vas very good. You are good person, Shawn. <hug>
To show you how deeply I care about you, I'd like you to have this ring. It would be wonderful if you'd wear it for me.
How dare you offer me that! I am vith Aeolus, not you.
You vish to give me ring - Vhy? Is valuable thing.
I want to be more than just friends with you.
Do you think you can buy love vith a ring? Or maybe you are like Sosi - you vant to kiss me?
I have fallen in love with you, Esme.
Silly Shawn! You know little about me. You just love vhat you see.
What I see in you is more than just your beauty... I see your passion, your joy in life. I want to be part of your life.
I do not know vhat a future vith you vhould be. I vant a nice home, enough money to never need more, and a good husband that I do not vorry about.
Somehow I do not think you can give me these things.
So keep your ring, Shawn. Maybe someday, I vill think of you more than friend.
You speak pretty vords, but vords do not make it so. My heart is not for sale, Shawn.

options.text: Tell Esme You Want to Be Friends

nodes.text: I want to be friends with you, Esme. This is just a friendly gift.
A "One and Only" Ring is more than a friendly gift, Shawn. It is special. But you vaste it by just giving it avay.
Keep the ring. Maybe someday, such a gift vill be meaningful between us.

options.text: Tell Esme You Want to Kiss

nodes.text: I really want to kiss you, Esme.
Okay then. Fair trade. <kiss>
If you vant more kisses, let me know. I vill be happy to trade a kiss for rings... Just don't expect to get anything more.
Maybe you should try to vin my affections vith more than fancy gifts, Shawn.
You vant to be my one and only true love? Shawn, yes! I vill be so happy to be your lover.
Katie, look! Shawn has given me his ring!
Congratulations, you two! I hope you are very happy together.
You bilge-sucking, scurvy, two-timing son of a Drat! May the devil and his kin drag you to hell!
This bloody bastard told me he loves me!
Is this true? Did you tell to Katie that you love her?
Um... er...
No... Say nothing! I can smell your fear. Get avay from me or I vill tear out your throat!
Maybe I shouldn't have offered Esme that ring in front of Katie...
Shawn loves you? Oh... that's very nice.
I found this book on Love Ballads. It expresses the way I feel about you. Would you like to have it?
A book of songs? How can songs be in a book? Songs are more than mere vords.
Well, songs are sort of like poems...
Poems are songs that have been dead and buried. All the life of the music is gone.
I found this magical ring... but it's not nearly as magical as you are. Would you like to keep it as a token of my feelings for you?
You give me magical ring... You must like me much.
I care very deeply for you.
It is nice you give me such a thing. You are good friend to me.
I am thinking you are not good catch in husbands. You are vild and crazy guy. I vant a man who gives me home, family, and safety.
But you are very sveet person. Maybe you vill make me happy. Ve should do more things together. Then maybe ve will learn our hearts.
You are most kind, Shawn. You are very cute, too. Mersi, I am thanking you much. <hug>
Ooh, is very magical! This is very vonderful gift! You are very sveet and kind to give this to me.
<kiss> You make me happy.
I found this incredibly magical ring from a very dangerous adventure, and I'd like you to have it. It may help keep you safe when I'm not at your side.
You give me magical ring... You must like me much.
I care very deeply for you.
It is nice you give me such a thing. You are good friend to me.
Is sad you are not good catch in husbands. You are vild and crazy guy. I vant a man who gives me home, family, and safety.
You are very sveet person. Maybe vhat you do vith me vill make me happy. Ve should do more things together. Then maybe ve will learn our hearts.
You are most kind, Shawn. You are very cute, too. Mersi, I am thanking you much. <hug>
Ooh, is very magical! This is very vonderful gift! You are very sveet and kind to give this to me.
<kiss> You make me happy.
I found this magical ring... but it's not nearly as magical as you are. Would you like to keep it as a token of my feelings for you?
You give me magical ring... You must like me much.
I care very deeply for you.
It is nice you give me such a thing. You are good friend to me.
You are not good catch in husbands. You are vild and crazy guy. I vant a man who gives me home, family, and safety.
You are very sveet person. Maybe vhat you do vith me vill make me happy. Ve should do more things together. Then maybe ve will learn our hearts.
You are most kind, Shawn. You are very cute, too. Mersi, I am thanking you much. <hug>
Ooh, is very magical! This is very vonderful gift! You are very sveet and kind to give this to me.
<kiss> You make me happy.
I picked out this beautiful rose just to give to you.
You give me rose. Does this mean you are courting me?
Um, this means I like you and want to be your friend.
You are good man, Shawn. You are friend.
You are very sweet, Shawn.
